mapper.select: select id, category_id, create_time, name, url, description, add_time, update_time, delted from wanjia_resource where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update wanjia_resource set delted = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select wr.id as id from wanjia_admin_role_relation ar left join wanjia_role r on ar.role_id = r.id left join wanjia_role_resource_relation rrr on r.id = rrr.role_id left join wanjia_resource wr on wr.id = rrr.resource_id where ar.admin_id = #{adminId} and wr.id is not null group by wr.id
